title: King Suite
details: The finest accommodations in our hotel, our Suites feature a separate living and sleeping area, with a handsome fireplace in a stylishly comfortable parlor and a private bedroom with a queen bed with 100% Italian cotton luxury linens and plush duvet style bedding. The Suite includes one Queen and one sofa bed. Three, flat-screen LED TV's including bathroom LED mirror television. Suite includes Bedroom, Parlor and Bath area with a whirlpool bath and multi-head shower. Suites offer from 600 to 800 square feet of space and working gas, remote control, original fireplaces. Breakfast, cocktails, WIFI, valet parking, chauffeur service and more - ALL inclusive with your guest room.
